mission.title: MISSION STATEMENT
mission.manifesto: We are Subcult ‚Äî a decentralized cooperative of creators, rebels, and visionaries reclaiming the digital frontier. We believe in radical collaboration, artistic freedom, and building outside the boundaries of traditional gatekeepers.

cooperative.title: HOW WE OPERATE
cooperative.description: Subcult operates as a worker-owned cooperative where every member has a voice and a stake in our collective success.

structure.heading: Democratic Governance
structure.description: One member, one vote. Major decisions are made collectively through transparent voting processes.

structure.heading: Revenue Sharing
structure.description: All members share in the profits generated through our collective work, distributed fairly based on contribution.

structure.heading: Mutual Support
structure.description: We provide resources, mentorship, and infrastructure to help each member thrive and grow their practice.

origin.title: ORIGIN STORY
origin.narrative: Born from frustration with exploitative platforms and gatekeeping institutions, Subcult emerged in 2024 as a radical experiment in collective creation. What started as a conversation between a handful of artists and technologists quickly evolved into a movement.

timeline.description: A small group of creatives began discussing alternatives to traditional creative platforms.
We launched our first collaborative projects, proving the model could work.
Established legal cooperative framework and governance processes.
Growing our membership and launching subcult.tv as our digital home.

cards.title: Open & Transparent
cards.description: No hidden algorithms. No secret deals. Everything we do is open to our members.

cards.title: Radically Collaborative
cards.description: We believe in the power of working together, sharing knowledge, and lifting each other up.

cards.title: Anti-Institutional
cards.description: We reject traditional gatekeepers and create our own paths to success.

cards.title: Artist-First
cards.description: Creators maintain full ownership and control of their work. Always.

cards.title: Decentralized
cards.description: Power is distributed among all members, not concentrated at the top.

cards.title: Experimental
cards.description: We're not afraid to try new things, fail fast, and iterate constantly.

cta.title: READY TO JOIN THE COLLECTIVE?
cta.description: We're always looking for passionate creators who share our vision of a better creative economy.
